section.title: We Need Feedback!
section.para: If you find a typographical error in this manual, or if you have thought of a way to make this manual better, we would love to hear from you. Please submit a report in our Bugzilla system: http://bugzilla.opennms.org.
Make sure to file against the problems in this manual against the Documentation component of the OpenNMS product, and to mention the identifier of this book: &BOOKID;
If you prefer to not use Bugzilla, or have a concern which requires a different level of feedback, you can also:

listitem.para: Subscribe to one of the many OpenNMS Email Discussion Lists
Chat with us on IRC at irc.freenode.net in the #opennms channel.
Call, Write, Skype or Fax The OpenNMS Group's Commercial Support. Details for contacting The OpenNMS Group, Inc. can be found at the Contact Us Form on their website.
